TextView.android:text: Asthma is a chronic condition where lung airways are inflamed and become narrowed at times. Its cause varies depending on the person, but is often the result of the immune systemâ€™s response to a substance in the lungs. Depending on the substance, there can be swelling and narrowing of the airways - making it harder to breathe. Symptoms include wheezing, coughing, and chest tightness, therefore it is necessary to consult a doctor to identify treatment options such as control medications, short-term medications, and breathing exercises.
